name: OAKLEY MOBILE LTD
description:
Oakley Mobile has the benefit of 14 years’ experience in software development, web services, database and hosting solutions allowing s us to draw on a great wealth of knowledge and experience.
We also have 5 years’ experience in integrated multi-platform/native app solutions to support business advantage for clients, their business partners, and their sector audience, both B2B and B2C. We have delivered & supported innovative mobile solutions on behalf of companies such as Equifax, Cisco, RAC, Hitachi, The London Pass, & Charities such as The Guide Dogs Association & Healthcare Organisations.
Because we are a small business we establish some very firm relationships with both our clients and our partners from the start. We are not merely an app development company, but a company that can offer a complete solution to meet requirements, drawing on experience gained through years of successful product deliveries.
Oakley’s approach is one of diligence. We ensure our clients are fully appraised in our knowledge of the mobile market, where the value can be achieved, what is achievable with a solution bespoke to their business, and consumer behaviour both in the use of mobile and market share of mobile devices/platforms. All of which support decisions for a phased implementation strategy combined with a longevity view of return on investment.
